CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Oracle Systems relative to Echo Dynamics?
SRP.A: Oracle Systems is {below} Echo Dynamics in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Luminara Solutions relative to Oracle Systems?
SRP.A: Luminara Solutions is {above} Oracle Systems in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Echo Dynamics relative to Luminara Solutions?
SRP.A: Echo Dynamics is {below} Luminara Solutions in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total patent applications?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Luminara Solutions}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total patent applications?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Echo Dynamics}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Oracle Systems's minimum Patent Applications in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Oracle Systems's minimum Patent Applications is in {1979}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Luminara Solutions's minimum Patent Applications in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Luminara Solutions's minimum Patent Applications is in {1982}.

NC.Q: Between 1984 and 1986, was the average total Patent Applications higher or lower than between 1981 and 1986?
NC.A: The average total patent applications between 1984 and 1986 was {higher} than between 1981 and 1986.

NC.Q: Between 1986 and 1987, did the total Patent Applications experience a larger or smaller change than between 1985 and 1991?
NC.A: The change in total patent applications between 1986 and 1987 was {smaller} than between 1985 and 1991.

NC.Q: Between 1980 and 1983, was the average total Patent Applications higher or lower than between 1981 and 1985?
NC.A: The average total patent applications between 1980 and 1983 was {lower} than between 1981 and 1985.

NC.Q: Between 1987 and 1989, was the average total Patent Applications higher or lower than between 1980 and 1985?
NC.A: The average total patent applications between 1987 and 1989 was {higher} than between 1980 and 1985.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Luminara Solutions} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Luminara Solutions and Echo Dynamics first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Luminara Solutions and Echo Dynamics did not exchange leading positions.
